title: Keyboard swaps in game
body:
Hi, I have a pretty annoying problem!
When I go in game, my keyboard swaps, I have an azerty keyboard but when the game starts and I press a it types q...
It's only typing a that  gives q, If i press a not in chat I active my a ability.
I know I should be posting this on the EUW boards, but they're close to dead...

does anyone know how to fix this?
Thanks! :)

replies.body: That's odd, do you have any third party programs that can be causing this?  What happens if you swap your keyboard.  I recommend restarting your PC in [cleanboot](https://support.gaijin.net/hc/en-us/articles/200070041-How-To-Perform-a-Clean-Boot-PC-MAC-), and slowly start opening up programs to see if it may be the impacting cause.  Let me know what you find.

I don't have any third party programs.
But I just played a game today and it fixed itself, :) I didn't do anything special, just turned off the pc and then on today.
Thank you for your reply though!

I don't have any third party programs.
But I just played a game today and it fixed itself, :) I didn't do anything special, just turned off the pc and then on today.
Thank you for your reply though!
